name: NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem
desc: An object used to add headers or footers to a collection view.

items.name: init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, elementKind: String, alignment: NSRectAlignment)
items.desc: Creates a boundary supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, with an alignment relative to a section or layout.

items.name: init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, elementKind: String, alignment: NSRectAlignment, absoluteOffset: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a boundary supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, with an alignment relative to a section or layout at an absolute offset.

items.name: var pinToVisibleBounds: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a header or footer is pinned to the top or bottom visible boundary of the section or layout it's attached to.

items.name: var offset: CGPoint
items.desc: The floating-point value of the boundary supplementary item's offset from the section or layout it's attached to.

items.name: var alignment: NSRectAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the boundary supplementary item relative to the section or layout it's attached to.

items.name: var extendsBoundary: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a boundary supplementary item extends the content area of the section or layout it's attached to.
